description: Metal Gear Solid: Stealth Espionage Action

v0.7.0.description:
## Version 0.7.0 - First Release!

### Install
Follow the Archipelago instructions for [Playing with custom worlds](https://archipelago.gg/tutorial/Archipelago/setup_en#playing-with-custom-worlds).  
Afterwards, ensure you select [Generate Template Options](https://archipelago.gg/tutorial/Archipelago/setup_en#creating-a-yaml) from the Archipelago Launcher to generate a default Metal Gear Solid YAML option file for editing.

### Setup
The Setup guide for this Archipelago mod can be found [here](https://github.com/SDMichaud/Archipelago-MGS/blob/main/worlds/mgs/docs/setup_en.md).

###
